title: Sustainable Farming Reflection
instructions: Write a short reflection (200 words) on how sustainable farming principles could be applied in your local area. Consider the environmental and economic factors specific to your region.

title: Soil Assessment Practice
instructions: Take photos of soil samples from three different locations and describe their characteristics. Upload the photos and provide a brief analysis of each sample's condition and potential improvements.

submissions.content: Sample 1: Dark, rich soil with visible organic matter - appears healthy. Sample 2: Clay-heavy soil, poor drainage noticed. Sample 3: Sandy soil, needs organic matter addition.
submissions.feedback: Excellent observations! Your analysis shows good understanding of soil characteristics.

title: Compost Plan Design
instructions: Create a detailed plan for setting up a compost system suitable for your space. Include materials list, location considerations, and maintenance schedule.

submissions.content: I plan to set up a three-bin compost system in my backyard corner. Materials needed: wire mesh, wooden pallets, and a pitchfork. I'll maintain a 30:1 carbon to nitrogen ratio and turn the pile weekly.

title: Personal Budget Creation
instructions: Create your own monthly budget using the template provided. Include all income sources and categorize your expenses. Set at least one savings goal.

title: Emergency Scenario Response
instructions: Choose one emergency scenario from the list provided and write a detailed response plan. Include step-by-step actions, when to call for help, and follow-up care considerations.
